entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
